showScoreExcerpt:
"McIntyre’s story is richer in sensory experience than in concrete fact...Plenty happens, much of it violent and strange. Settlements are set on fire and abandoned...A bit of this goes a long way and McIntyre’s various shamanistic encounters eventually offer diminishing returns...This is a show thematically concerned with ways of seeing, but its greater rewards come from its journey into sound."
